author: Maria Elena Police
text: On Tuesday, I read the trickster tale, “My Lucky Day”.  On Wednesday, I read the sequel that my class wrote 5 years ago. Joshua was so inspired that he wrote “My Lucky Day Part 3”! He read it to the class and we LOVED it! 👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻 https://t.co/R46B3j5Rm6
